Subsection.Text: The board of directors shall file notice of each meeting of the board in the same manner as is required of a state governmental body under s. 286.0105.

If the department has designated an area or areas of the state in which the corporation may act, the board of directors shall file notice of each meeting of the board in the same manner and in the same locations as is required of a governmental body under chapter 286.
The board of directors is subject to the provisions of s. 286.011.
